name: Digitasport Holdings Limited
description: Developer of a video editor platform designed to promote gaming content. The company's platform provides a game arena, and a medium for content creators to showcase their talent through clip-sharing by offering them easy-to-use video editing and social media distribution tools, enabling content creators to create and edit their content to formats suitable for various social media platforms.
one_liner: Developer of a video editor platform designed to promote gaming content. The company's platform provides a game arena, and a medium for content creators to showcase their talent through clip-sharing by offering them easy-to-use video editing and social media distribution tools, enabling content creators to create and edit their content to formats suitable for various social media platforms.
